DASHBOARD.HEADLINE1: Never miss what's trending right now!
DASHBOARD.HEADLINE2: See the latest tops and get inspired by the latest and greatest repositories on GitHub

ABOUT.TEXT1:
We are 2 Master's degree students @ Polytechnic University of Timisoara, Romania. 
We are passionated about technology and we do work as software developers. Working everyday with Git and also having our personal projects having Git as a version-control system, we definitely know how important GitHub is.
ABOUT.TEXT2: As of May 2019, GitHub reports having over 37 million users and more than 100 million repositories. This is a huge amount of data to search through. By taking only the trending information, people will be able to easily find and learn what matters the most right now.
ABOUT.TEXT3: We are happy to see you visiting our website! If you want to give a helpful hand or any kind of feedback, you can reach out to us on, obviously, GitHub:
